shortdesc.ph: Adjusts the remote playback volume of the music file.
Adjusts the remote playback volume of the music file.
Adjusts the remote playback volume of the music file.
Adjusts the remote playback volume of the music file.

section.p: This method adjusts the playback volume of the mixed music file on the remote end.
This method adjusts the playback volume of the mixed music file on the remote side.
This method adjusts the remote playback volume of the mixed music file.
This method adjusts the playback volume of the mixed music file on the remote end.

section.title: Timing
section.p: You must call this method after calling and receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(AudioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
You need to call this method after calling and receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(AudioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
You need to call this method after calling and receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(audioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
You need to call this method after calling and receiving the OnAudioMixingStateChanged(AUDIO_MIXING_STATE_PLAYING) callback.

plentry.pd: Volume of the music file. The range is [0,100], where 100 (default) is the original volume.
The volume of the music file. The range is [0,100]. 100 (default) is the original volume.
Volume of the music file. The range is [0,100], where 100 (default) is the original volume.
The volume of the music file. The range is [0,100], where 100 (default) is the original volume.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
